body.name: AZDOME M301 2K Dash Cam Front and Rear, Built in WiFi, Dual Dashcams for Cars, Voice Control Car Camera with UHD 1440P, Night Vision, G-Sensor, Parking Monitor, 64GB SD Card Included
deliveryMessages: FREE delivery Wednesday, February 21. Order within 3 hrs 7 mins
features: 📷【2K 1440P Dash Cam】AZDOME M301 Dash Cam is an excellent device equipped with a high-definition 2K (2560x1440P) UHD front camera. With the added features of WDR and F1.8 large aperture, this dash cam is capable of capturing every moment in clear detail, even in low light situations. Additionally, the dash cam supports micro SD cards up to 128GB class 10 - U3 speed, and comes with a 64GB memory card included. Get the AZDOME M301 Dash Cam today to ensure that you never miss a moment on the road.

📷【Built-in Wifi】“AZDOME” App allows you to remotely control the M301 dash camera within a 3-5 meter range. You can change settings, view real-time footage, take photos and videos, playback recordings, and download files to your phone for editing. Additionally, the app makes it easy to share your recorded videos with friends and family on social media. Download the AZDOME App now for seamless control and effortless sharing of your M301 dash camera footage.

📷【Hands-Free VOICE Control】M301 smart car dash camera offers six voice commands for hands-free photo and video taking, allowing you to travel without worry. You can easily finish tasks with just your voice, including "Turn on WiFi/Turn off WiFi," "Take picture," "Open Recording/Turn off Recording," and "Lock the video." Please note that say a command, but ONLY support English. Get the M301 smart car dash camera today and enjoy the convenience of hands-free operation.

📷【Hidden & Wide Angle】M301 car dash camera features a 170° super wide-angle lens that provides a wider field of vision, ensuring you can see more effectively in any condition. Its discreet design allows you to stick the dash cam to the windshield for an optimal view without attracting attention, promoting safe driving. Get the M301 car dash camera today and enjoy a wider perspective on the road.

📷【Loop Recording/G-sensor/Parking Monitor】 When the SD card is full, it will cover the previous video file to continue the recording. When the Built-in G-sensor detects a sudden shock or collision, the camera will automatically lock video, which will not be covered by the loop recording. With the parking monitor feature enabled, the car camera detects vibration for 24/7, even if the car is parked. (need connect to Hardwire kit or External battery, Hardwire kit is sold separately)

📷【Super Night Vision】AZDOME M301 dash cam enhances exposure in low-light conditions to provide clear imaging, giving you confidence when driving at night. With its WDR and F1.8 large aperture, it ensures clarity and displays road details such as license plates and road signs, making it a reliable guardian for your car day or night. Drive with peace of mind knowing that the AZDOME M301 dash cam has got you covered.

📷【Heat Resistant with Super Capacitor】Super capacitor powered instead of lithium batteries, which are built to survive extreme weather conditions from -4°F-158°F. ideal for hot weather areas like Arizona, Florida, Texas, or extremely cold areas. And it also gives a longer life-span than lithium-ion battery dashcams in the market so that you can enjoy your journey at ease.

📷【64GB SD Card Included & Worry-free Warranty】AZDOME we support a max. 128GB SD card (includes a 64GB SD card). We offer a 30-day full refund or replacement, 12-month warranty, and lifetime after-sales service support. If you have any questions about our products, feel free to contact us, and we'll respond within 24 hours. Choose AZDOME for reliable products and exceptional customer service.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 14, 2024
reviews.reviewText: Everything working perfectly have no complaints

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on August 20, 2023
Reviewed in the United States on October 23, 2023
reviews.reviewText: This dashcam works really good. Records when it detects excessive motion or crash. I have noticed it will record hard bumps and curves if you take them going fast. You can connect to it with your phone via wifi and look at the videos which are very good quality/clarity. The only thing I don't like about it is you have to attach it to your windshield with a sticky pad on it. I would prefer a suction cup. Overall it's a good dash cam that works.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 15, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great dash camera
reviews.reviewText: This dash camera system was fairly easy to install with no real issues at all. The cable to the rear camera was long enough for us to easily hide. The cameras do use sticky pads to hold them in place. We actually had a left over suction rig from another accessory and stuck the camera to that and then suctioned to the windshield, works great. You can view your videos on your cell phone via the app. Nice product that works.

reviews.reviewerName: Talks too much and displays delusions of adequacy
reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 28, 2023
Reviewed in the United States on September 28, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 2.0 out of 5 stars It's okay. When it comes to dash cams, you certainly get what you pay for.
reviews.reviewText: This is on the more affordable spectrum, and it shows. As others have stated, the GPS feature is only available with their add on. Set up does take a bit of time. Took us around an hour to set up and get all the cable management going so that it wouldn't look like a giant eyesore.You can't access any of the recordings unless you're actually in the car, which is a major nuisance. Over all it seems to have more cons than pros. It doesn't do parking recording, so if anything happens to your car while it's parked, that's too bad. It is small and compact and you get two. One for the rear and one for the front, which I really liked that, but again, there are so many little inconveniences that just add up. I would call this an interim dash cam. A dash cam you use while you save up for a better one.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 31, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Very simple setup and install
reviews.reviewText: This is a basic camera that will work quite well for even a technologically stunted driver. My husband had it installed and operating perfectly in a half hour. The app allows you to see the video, as there is no screen on the camera. It is super small and unobtrusive in the car, though I do wish it was a suction cup instead of the adhesive...not sure how well that's going to hold up in our ridiculous southern summer heat. All the wiring is plenty long enough, though we did have to replace the under dash sticky cable holder with a Command branded one - but it wasn't a big deal.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on August 22, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Good dash cam
reviews.reviewText: I installed the Azdome M301 dash cam inside my Toyota Corolla.The installation was simple, and everything needed including the Micro SD card were part of the package. It took me less than 30 minutes to complete the install (still need to clean up the wiring though).To access the dash cam and make any changes to the configurations I had to connect my iPhone WIFI to the dash cam. Doing so disconnect the phone from CarPlay and disconnect you from Internet.Pros: - Compact design - Front and back cameras - All the parts are shipped with the unit including a 64GB Micro SD card (it supports up to 128GB of class 10 Micro SD cards) - WIFI capable - Good operating temperature (-4F to 158F) - G-sensor will lock the recording in event of collision to protect it from overwritingCons: -No GPS data (locations and speed) are part of the recording - No internal battery, Most of newer dash cams comes with an internal rechargeable battery that continues recording for hours after engine is shut off. You need to purchase a wiring kit and install it before using the parking mode.This dash cam has voice command support although Voice control is only limited to 7 commands and not always working.Overall, this is a good dash cam that does the basic and very comparable to other dash cam at $40 price point. Note the list price is $69 but there is $30 coupon that makes the final price $39.99. Recommended.
